FuncDef: This mandatory command provisions a specific MDA type to the device configuration for the slot. The MDA can be preprovisioned but an MDA must be provisioned before ports can be configured. Ports can be configured once the MDA is properly provisioned.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the type of MDA selected for the slot position. Values for this attribute vary by platform and release. The release notes include a listing of all supported mda-types and their CLI strings. In addition, the command can be queried to check which mda-types are relevant for the active platform type. Some examples include me6-10gb-spf+ and x4-100g-cfp2.
Specifies the MDA level. Possible values vary by MDA type.
